website_summaries.verdict: An exposed-pole tent that offers sturdy setup, 2 windows and 2 interior pockets.
pros: Waterproof tent base included – will help you protect your floors from spills
cons: This model doesn't seem as sturdy as some others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing tent
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love! What a great tent! And free same day delivery was such a treat. I don't do a lot of reviews but this was is simply amazing! And it comes with lights and some decore. Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Olga Kurat

customer_reviews.title: Was great in the beginning and then....
customer_reviews.text: It was great and then a month in and and the one if the strings broke from the top and it collapsed with my daughter in it. Thankfully she wasn’t asleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Mininni

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Smell
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be a million tee-pees like this on the market. I loved the look and price of this one. I am concerned about the heavy coating of chemicals that make up the canvas. It was strong. I was not about to let my baby inhale fumes as she camped out. Wash first. And I would like to hear where and how the company chose to manufacture this product and how much they value the health of their consumers.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this teepee for my granddaughters birthday. It is perfect. I wish I had one when I was little. I hope she loves it as much as I do. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Crider

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made- Not safe for small children, and the lights are just something seller threw in.
customer_reviews.text: The lights did not actually go with the teepee, so there was no secure place to put them out of a childs reach, and while on the subject, there is no support on the bottom legs to keep from a child pulling and the tee pee crashing on top off a toddler. Was purchased for a reading nook for a toddler, and would absolutely NOT recommend for such.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie McInnis

customer_reviews.title: An Absolute Nightmare to Put Together
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS TEEPEE. It is not worth the frustration and hassel. I have been at this for TWO HOURS and I cannot get the strings and the poles to fit together. I have watched at least 12 YouTube videos, but none of them helped! There are NO loops (as shown in many of the videoes); there are TWO strings instead of one; although there are four holes, it is just too difficult to make it all work. The teepee is a BIG DISAPPOINTMENT. I will never buy this teepee again. NEVER.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nolan

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TEEPEE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the teepee for my daughter 7th birthday and we all love it! Pure white, cotton canvas (it is important for me because I like to throw it in the wash when needed), cute little windows, 4 pockets inside for her favorite books and toys and it even has a bottom part. I fit in it with her but she rather take the dog :). I love the visible wood poles as they allow me to hang decorations and banners. Perfect size for her room. Quick delivery and great communication!
customer_reviews.author: Federica

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money! Garbage product.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is garbage. It closes up on its own, it won’t stay open you have to keep pulling it open. The wooden pieces are so flimsy and weak, this teepee definitely won’t last long and definitely was not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if we got a defective one, but we’ve followed the directions 3 separate times and this Teepee does not stay up. Also- how to tie the top is incredibly unclear. The slightest touch will cause one of the sides to completely collapse. Considering this is for children, it should be much more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Pieces do not fit! Manufacturing issue! DO NOT BUY until they fix!
customer_reviews.text: Hardly write reviews...but this needs to be addressed....I ordered this item and did not work because the pieces do not fit, Amazon sent a replacement and the EXACT same thing has happened. This is clearly a manufacturing issue, I would not purchase! Go with another brand... Amazon does not care either, will offer a cheap coupon for your time and frustration... not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Great material, easy setup, won't stay open
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice and the material is great. The setup came with great, clear instructions, but I cannot figure out how to get the corners to stay wide. Kiddo doesn't even have to touch it, and they inch inward until the material is slack and droopy. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, but it's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Came with black marks like greese stains
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that this product came with what basically look grease stains/marks on it - it’s quite expensive and our daughters photo shoot is today so didn’t have time to return it to get a new one. The little feathers are cute but very cheap - just paper dipped in glitter with cheap string. The lights are cute but wish they included little clips or something to mount the lights in the inside of the tent - used tape instead. I think it is easy to put together. It’s a great gift if it doesn’t come with these stains on it. It seems pretty durable but we will see how today goes at the shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a total of 5 tent. 4 out of the 5 arrived dirty. The tents are white, the stains extremely visible. Eye sore! The water proof base was not included with any of the tents I received.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Cute but fragile
customer_reviews.text: First one came with only 3/4 poles having a top hole to tie together. The second one came with one pole split on the end and another with a crack that would definitely break under a little pressure. I have three boys and this thing definitely wouldn’t hold up against them if I would have kept it. Good fabric though, but the poles just aren’t quality wood. Not going to bother with a 3rd one.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: The is absolutely the worst thing I have ever purchased! I am SOOO disappointed. Today is my daughters birthday and I wanted to setup the teepee before she comes home from school but it is not meant to be. 1.5 hours later and I still cant get this thing to setup like its supposed to and I'm an ENGINEER! Bad design! I can't remember anything making me this frustrated. I want my money back. I'm not even sure the canvas is cut to fit the poles. It doesn't seem to fit.
customer_reviews.author: the editor

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with quality.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with quality. These days you can get a lot of junk....I was hoping for $45 this wouldn’t be junk. I was impressed with the quality of the canvas and the ease of putting it together. I washed & dried it in the water/dryer and ironed it prior to putting it up (ya, I’m crazy like that) and it didn’t shrink or alter in size or condition. It’s small....maybe 2 kids 5 yrs and under can sit in together. It is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: It's so much fun to decorate
customer_reviews.text: I had so much fun decorating this teepee. It has beautiful pine poles and the tent is made of 100% cotton. It even comes with fairy lights and feathers! I love how it has a waterproof base making it perfect for inside and outside use. We currently have it set up on our front patio but it's super easy to transport and take anywhere inside our house too. It has so many different features like the two little windows with closing curtains, front closing flap and two big pockets for books and toys.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but doesn’t stay flat!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, love the lights and the neutral color. My girls love sitting in there and playing/reading. The major problem I have, is that it doesn’t stay upright. The poles constantly slide inward, and the sides are bunched up. So we are going to try another style. I would return it if it wasn’t such a pain to pack back up...
customer_reviews.author: Tch37165

customer_reviews.title: So easy to store and bring out
customer_reviews.text: Ok so we totally love this tent! Two windows which I think other then the star lights are my daughters favorite part. Super roomy! I love that the floor is water resistant and it’s already saved us once. My favorite part is how easy you can put it away and bring it out again. Such a well made tent. I’m incredibly impressed and looking forward to them having a area to hanging out in as school is coming up and we home school.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtnie

customer_reviews.title: So fun for girls!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter wanted to play in her brothers teepee and now she has her own. Which he's very happy about:) She loves it, and it's absolutely adorable. Just the right amount of room for her to play with her toys or books. And it has lights, which means it's not just for daytime use. Since we live in different cities, I wasn't there for the setting up, but was told it was simple and everything worked and it was complete as advertised. I saw pictures; she certainly looked happy posing with her stuffed animals!
customer_reviews.author: Ama-holic

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had the right pieces
customer_reviews.text: Pretty upset about this one. The instructions say I should have 4 bottom, 8 middle, and 4 top pole sections. I have 8 bottom, 4 middle, and 4 top sections. I was hoping to get this in time for my daughter’s birthday but it looks like I’ll have to return this or wait for extra pieces. I can’t figure out how to reach out to the seller. The contact information that was included in the package does not include an email address. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: So i originally bought this for my toddler, but my 6 and 7 year old enjoy it more (of course)! My husband assembled it. He said it was fairly easy, although the directions were extremely vague and didn’t outline exactly how the string needed to go through/ be tied to the poles. He also stated it was a bit tedious, but not too lengthy. My kids absolutely love it and it’s really cute, win win for me!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with this!! Quality and design is so good!
customer_reviews.text: We love this tent!!! The quality is amazing. It's a good weight canvas and real wooden dowels. The design is clean so we don't mind keeping it in our main sitting room. There are so many cute details like the windows that open, 4 pockets that fit our little girls books, the cute twinkle lights, the feather decorations...all so we'll thought out! Our 1 year old daughter loves "reading" in here and playing with her toys, but I know we will use this for years to come! Planning to buy this as a gift for all of my favorite little ones 🤍
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our play room!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is adorable! My kids love it - the only thing I would say that kinda stinks about it is that the legs don’t really stay where you put them when you pull them apart to have the inside flat. I find I have to keep adjusting so it’s flat and spread out. The other thing is the poles need to be re-tightened every so often. Other than that, it’s a great addition to our play room and the material is sturdy and it seems to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Imaginative Play at its best.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled with the quality of this product. The canvas and other materials are sturdy and well crafted. I love the aesthetic of the white with natural poles, it's much less overwhelming in our small space. The windows are not only fun for my little one to peek through, but gives me a peek into his play while he is inside. The pockets and twinkle lights just set it a part from similar products. Loving this tent for my 15 month old and know we will use it for years to come both inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Bainum

customer_reviews.title: Well made Teepee!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this teepee for my grand daughter's first birthday to use as a prop. It was so nice and well made that it ended up being used in her bedroom and has withstood her crawling around and playing in it on a daily basis. Friends have also used it for birthday props for their little ones. If you are looking at this teepee for whatever reason, I don't think you would regret buying it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Byrdstowntn

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not as plush as expected
customer_reviews.text: Cute tent, sturdy and easy to assemble. Knocked a few stars off because while all photos show the same plush bottom, the bottom is made of the same material as the sides. The lights are a nice touch, but my set will not turn off (have to remove a battery to turn off, and replace the battery to turn on).
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great teepee but did not receive all correct parts making it droopy.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because only 2 of 4 top pieces had the holes drilled in. Do not think my teepee is as sturdy and stable as it would be if the string was fed through all 4 holes. Other than receiving 2/4 top pieces the teepee is very good quality. I would have given 5 stars in each category if I received correct parts. Edit - the company contacted me and sent me the correct parts.
customer_reviews.author: denise2580

customer_reviews.title: Faulty and missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why other people are getting such quality ones, but I’ve received two, one was faulty and the other one was missing wood and .org teepees were torn. I almost forgot to put a review for this. Maybe I’m just unlucky, but not willing to buy a third to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Alovey

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our 2.5 yr olds room
customer_reviews.text: Got this teepee for our 2 1/2 year old daughter when moving some baby items out of her room for her baby sisters arrival. She was so excited about the teepee, she didn’t even realize that anything else was missing. The feathers and lights were an extra special touch. She even asked if she could sleep in it...
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leary to order this teepee due to other reviews saying how hard it was to set up, but I was pleasantly surprised that it was not that difficult. I have bad arthritis, but was still able to put it together easily with just a little help from my 6 year old grandson steadying it as I threaded the rope through the top holes in the poles. It is quite sturdy and the grandchildren love it. The big side pockets are great for them to tuck away some toys. The material is thicker than I expected and should last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: songbird

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this TeePee Tent!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this TeePee tent!! She would literally sleep in it every night if it were up to her! She loves to read books or play with her tablet in it, while sitting on her bean bag or pillow. It’s so roomy, it can actually fit her & I with plenty of room to spare! The windows on the front & back are not only super charming but also great for a little privacy 😉 we couldn’t be happier with this purchase & I have a feeling this TeePee tent will be a favorite piece in her room for months/years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Kinney

customer_reviews.title: MISSING NUT & BOLT (AND some buyers may not even realize it)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent, set it up, loved it, and so did my son. I then raved about it to friends and family and they purchased the same one. HERE IS THE PROBLEM. Their tents came with two sets of nuts and bolts - so the tent doesn't close/fall on the child! After comparing, it seems the tents that are still being sold (without the nuts/bolts), SHOULD BE PULLED FROM THE MARKET! How is this appropriate? FYI - the models with the nuts and bolts should show that last step at "installing the nuts and bolts"
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. Well priced, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 2nd birthday gift and the recipient would hardly come out even to eat cake. Neither would anyone else. At one point there was a grandmother, an aunt, and the birthday girl all in the teepee. So I would say it was a hit. Easily assembled (and I'm a fumblefingers at putting things together), easily moved from room to room while assembled. The feathers and lights are not necessary but okay if you like them. The canvas was sturdy and well sewn together, the poles and connections were all smooth and went together with ease. Really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caney Fork

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old, and dog, love it
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute tepee! It's really a great reading nook.It was fairly easy to assemble, but took two of us. It's been a little challenging to find a good cushion for the floor. Large floor pillows are pretty expensive, so we just threw down a few extra pillows we had and threw a blanket on top of it. It does get rather warm in there, and my daughter wishes it was a little bigger so I could comfortably lay in there with her. And her hair gets stuck on the string of lights, so we keep having to readjust it. Unexpected plus - my dog loves it! I find him in there every morning.
customer_reviews.author: WingsR4Flying

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy materials
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my kids worn out teepee. I really love this teepee. It is very easy to assemble and is made of sturdy materials. My only small complaint would be that I wish the poles were a solid piece instead of multiple pieces that have to be put together. Other than that small thing it's really cute. I imagine this will last until my kid outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: An instant hit with my grandson
customer_reviews.text: This thing is stinking awesome. My grandson wouldn't come out of it once it was set uo. This was simple to set up. Put the 4 ones together. Insert poles into slots in the canvas. Thread strings thru the holes at the top of the poles. Stand the tent up, spread out the poles and tighten the strings. Took about 10 minutes! I can see years of fun to come with this tent. It seems to be made very well. I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to assemble and disassemble.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 2 year old birthday. Assembled in advance to see if all parts were there. Really impressed with the quality of fabric, that it is easy to wash and easily folds back into the included bag. Glad that the tepee is tall so Mom and daughter can fit inside. I’m 5’6” and the top of the poles reach my height. Poles were easy to assemble and good quality wood. Instructions were easy to follow. I put the tepee up by myself. I’m really looking forward to giving it to my granddaughter next month and seeing what the finished product looks like once the lights are on.
customer_reviews.author: Starfire

customer_reviews.title: Good size tent for kids
customer_reviews.text: I love how big this tent is. The picture is kind of misleading with that. The lights do come with it so that was nice and they have 2 different lighting modes which was above my expectations. The poles are a little difficult to get into the connectors but not bad. So far my kids love playing in it and we've had many adventures in it and we've only had it a week! Great idea for a kid's play place if you don't have a while playroom. Great idea for grandparents to have as a small kids space to make a little kid corner in their home as well
customer_reviews.author: Lanton Walker

customer_reviews.title: The Best Teepee!
customer_reviews.text: We love this Teepee and there are not enough words to describe how perfect it is. We love that it is so easy fast to assemble as well as put away in the storage bag. The quality is amazing and we love that the canvas can be machine washed. My little one loves it so much it is the first thing she runs to in the morning. She loves to bring her toys inside to play and read books inside. I love how the teepee will be used for many years as she grows. It is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and so beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I m really happy with the product quality and how easy it is to assemble. Glad the fabric is non- toxic and that is mess free because with two little boys mess is always a part of it 😂 It’s super cute and my boys love it! Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline Spadoni

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 teepees and this was the winner. Very cute! More prices to put together than the others but the benefit is it packs down smaller too. Perfect size for indoors. My 3 year old and I can play in it together. Well made. Love the star lights and feather accents. The feathers are just paper, but still cute. Definitely recommend. Update: The teepee ripped where the pocket attaches when my daughter used the book pockets. It doesn’t seem like this should happen under normal use. Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This tent is super cute. I'm pretty happy with it and my daughter loves it. I will say though it wasnt very easy to put together when it came to tying it at the top. It took a long time to get the poles right and the instructions were kinda vague on that part. It also had some black stains on one of the sides and back but you can't see those where it is placed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrswillson68

customer_reviews.title: Was great until it broke
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this as a Christmas present! We had it out for weeks with consistent play. Sadly the rope that holds the Teepee up ripped in half and it is no longer usable. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: KatMac

customer_reviews.title: Terribly smells and not breathing
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this tent, but material from which it made is not breathable. So play inside or stay inside even for several minutes is impossible. My son even with open doorway turns red after five minutes. My husband and I try to stay inside and we couldn’t be there more than two minutes. It also smells terribly. In addition lights were broken in five days. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marina E.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent , perfect size 😍
customer_reviews.text: Originally got a tent at target but it was way to huge and took up half my 7 yr olds room. So took it back and got this tent. So glad I did. Perfect size and made well. Super easy to put together and close up. I got her a few pillows and a shag rug to put in there and she loves it. I love that it also doesnt clash and looks nice and modern. A must buy. Just be careful with the lights if you have a small child could be a strangelation hazard. You can just opt not to put the lights on or mabey secure them where they wont come in contact or be accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Looks Magical!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe what a great price this was! I had been looking at these for awhile and when I saw that this comes with the lights too, I was sold. I have not set this up yet as it is going to be a Christmas present, but I can't wait for my little one to wake up to this up with the lights on Christmas morning. It will be so magical for her. We also purchased a furry rug to go in the teepee once installed. It is going to be such a cute little hang out spot for her.
customer_reviews.author: K.C

customer_reviews.title: Tent sides are slack
customer_reviews.text: This tent is adorable and my child loves to read and play in it. The star lights are a nice touch. I will say that the tent itself is sort of draped over the poles. The walls are not taut and the poles do not stay fully opened. I still stays open and stays upright safely and there is plenty of room inside so I don't mind that it drapes. It still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: We are obsessed with this amazing teepee. How strong it is, the quality and the details. It’s so easy to assemble and instructions are just on point . Highly recommended this product my daughter love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wenly

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and looks great
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looks alot better in pictures. Mine didn't come with the feather decoration which my daughter was looking forward to. I will contact the seller to see if they can send it separately. Will update my review once I get a response. Update* I got a card from the seller which was a very nice gesture and I must say they took care of the issue right away. Just from the customer service alone I would definitely order more March from this seller. The tepee has held out well so far and ive got so many compliments from family and friends. Will definitely be sending my family and friends here when they look to buy a teepe. 👌😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids Teepee
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the teepee! we bought it for my daughter's baby shower as decoration and to be used later for the baby's nursery or playroom! The material is high quality! It is hard to keep the poles completely spread open, not sure how this will effect use when my grand daughter is actually in it. The fairy lights are super cute but wish there were clips inside to attach them to! The feathers are paper but cute! Overall I am happy with the quality of the teepee! It was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler this past Christmas. I always research before and buy, and this is one of those products that I had mixed feelings about. We set it up in my daughter’s room on Christmas Eve and its looks so stylish and super expensive. It was easy to assemble. It comes with lights, and feather decor. It can be broken down for on the go in the cute little cinch bag it came with. The fabric is durable too. This tipi is quite big – enough room for little play dates. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Straight Up Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Baby girl loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Assemble was super easy. Wooden dowells feel like they are made of pine so be careful during assembly. Do not over tighten when putting together the dowells and couplings. Canvis went up easy as well, but you must use patience. Overall grate product. Will it hold up to the test of time? Only time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Frankiebaby

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought but still awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an actual teepee with 3 sticks, to my surprise this has four sides which is AWSOME for more room and playing as your kids grow but it was too big for my daughters play room (which is actually a walk in closet). LUCKILY, you can pull two sides together and roll the fabric inside to make it a bit smaller. I also took the lights and sewed them on the inside of the teepee which made it more personal and it lighter for story time 🖤
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Best tent out there
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Very good quality and I have to say the the fabric on this tent is perfect, like my daughter spilled juice in the tent and it wiped clean off! I highly recommend this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Lights Included!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter. It's in her room and she calls it her story tent. By far, this was the best and most used gift we got her. It was quick to assemble, the lights work great, and the pockets inside the tent have been the most useful part. There's two pockets on either side and each pocket holds 4-6 books. It's had definitely made bedtime much easier. I bought it because the lights were included but the pockets are the best part.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lights don’t work well but very cute
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this texts 5 stars but the “fairy star lights” that come with it won’t stay on. There are two options: blinking and then continuous on. The blinking works but not continuous. I reached out to the company to see if they will send a replacement. Waiting to hear back but will update once I hear, otherwise, such a cute tent.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Waterproof floor teepee!
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun playing in this this summer! It’s easy to store, washable and easy to set up! I love love love the waterproof floor super handy for having toddlers... we’ve had other teepees in the past and.... they were nearly impossible to clean this one is FAR easier to clean and can be thrown in the washer
customer_reviews.author: Bre-Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Superb Customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: My first review was a 3 because of missing parts, but after they reached out to me and are taking are of everything without me having to track them down they get more than a 5! They get 5+ in customer service, satisfaction, and the product is also a quality product for a great value. I can't wait to get the parts so I can see this great product in its complete state! My daughter loved it before (held up with tape) so I can't wait to see what her reaction is when it is sturdy. Thank you Lisa or reaching out to me and making things right. It is rare to find companies who care so much so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque M Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Cute tepee
customer_reviews.text: This tepee is the cutest, it can be used to play, read, or as a photography prop. We had an amazing tea party in it. If you have small children under Five this is a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Maveli

customer_reviews.title: So perfect & adorable teepee tent w/lights
customer_reviews.text: This is so adorable and perfect for what I wanted it for. It came so nicely packed with easy instructions and cute starlight twinkle lights. My two fur babies love it and it looks so beautiful in my living room, it’s made of quality material and there’s no chemical smell. Not too big and not too small. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for kids/ Adds style to room decor
customer_reviews.text: I have two toddler boys and a 5 year old girl. They all are in love with this tent. It fits so beautifully in their playroom. I originally ordered it for my daughter but the boys have been enjoying it just as much. Three children can fit comfortably inside to relax, play pretend, read, or even watch TV. They really get a kick out of the string lights included and the side window that opens and closes. I put it together several weeks ago and its still standing strong. I highly recommend this for any kid under 13.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Maclin II

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a pain.
customer_reviews.text: I never knew how hard it was to set up a teepee. It took me quite sometime getting the poles to place tight when wrapping the cord around the top and then putting them in the little pockets on the bottom. It was just a pain. I finally got it put together and its really cute! Love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: K8Cat

customer_reviews.title: Solid Teepee
customer_reviews.text: I love that the teepee uses wooden rods for the supports instead of plastic. This is much more durable, especially with kids who are tough on everything. The inside pockets are large and hold books, and even my son’s tablet, without causing the sides to cave in. I know some reviews had stated there was an odor but ours didn’t have one. Also, the canvas is heavy and will be easy to take down and throw in the wash!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered this because I read so many poor reviews of other teepees and assumed I would have problems with setup or poor quality. However, this was not the case and this teepee far exceeded my expectations. The poles are a really nice sanded wood (which come in four-piece segments and you connect them with pvc-type connectors). The canvas is a nice, thick off-white color. The battery-operated lights are a great bonus. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Teepee Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sturdy easy to put together. My 14 month old and 14 year old both love it! I even lay in it with my baby. I researched all the teepees and this one was definitely the correct one! No complaints at all and I am extremely critical of purchases and take my time reviewing.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hope Hendrixson

customer_reviews.title: Glamping at it's finest from home!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, sturdy enough to withstand being use in a play room and accessories to decorate to fit your mood! Our daughter loved helping me get it built and setting it up for her to have a sleepover with one of her friends "under the stars" she said. The liked being able to rearrange the lights on the outside and the inside as well as cover the windows so no one could see in while they played dolls inside. This has been a great purchase for our family!
customer_reviews.author: Farin

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I wanted to get our daughter a tent for her bedroom, a quiet place she could read her books and have some "me" time. Christmas morning she unwrapped it, I unboxed it, and had the teepee set up in less than a half hour. Needless to say, she was in and out of it all morning! I like that it's made from wood and canvas material. Durable, yet soft enough for children. The windows are great, especially if your child likes to play peek a boo. It's a little larger than I expected, but I'm glad she won't outgrow it anytime soon. Well worth the price, and better than most cheapy store bought ones I've seen!
customer_reviews.author: Jason McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and fairly easy to assemble. The assembly is oddly similar to an actual teepee in the sense that it’s held together with sticks and ties. No clips or screws to make it extra sturdy, just 4 sticks held together with some loops and a shoestring. It’s adorable and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: 12456789sun

customer_reviews.title: cute teepee tent
customer_reviews.text: I really love how cute this teepee tent is. We had the pop up red tent from ikea originally but this is significantly nicer and less of an eye sore. I especially love the windows on it and the fairy lights. My toddler has been playing in it for the past few weeks now and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Loved all the extras included!
customer_reviews.text: What a special little space this has become for our kids! Some of our favorite features have got to be the included string of star lights, the book pockets, and the reinforced window openings that my 14 month old loves to play peek a boo through. We’ve had it for a little over a month and it’s still THE place to hang.
customer_reviews.author: RDyers

customer_reviews.title: It's Surived a Kindergarten Classroom
customer_reviews.text: This tent has survived 100+ days in a kindergarten classroom, so that seems like a pretty good quality indicator to me. I did create cushions for the interior, which has helped keep the tent standing. (I got two planks of wood and stapled on a mattress pad and upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay teepee. It looks nice but it was kind of a pain to assemble and the instructions weren’t very helpful. When it’s put together it’s really not that sturdy. I keep having to straighten the legs out so the fabric isn’t scrunched up. I actually ended up just putting it away after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble! Love that the neutral colors make it easy to add special touches to it, like flowers around the top.
customer_reviews.author: LNF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Store
customer_reviews.text: I bought the teepee for my granddaughter who just turned two years old. We have had a BLAST! The teepee was very easy to put together and we were playing inside right away. I love being able to store the teepee, assembled, by pulling the sides together and flopping it in a corner. I am very impressed with the material and think it will last us a long, long time. The lights are a fun bonus. Highly recommended. Enjoy and have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Really well made. Once you add the stars doesn’t even need additional decorations. Love it! The bottom is not padded so you need to pit something else to make it comfortable and pillows too.
customer_reviews.author: Letivan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 1 yr old's first bday and he LOVED it. It literally took about 5 minutes to assemble and I'm no bob villa. The lights are adorable and perfect for nighttime. He absolutely loved this teepee and was running in and out of it smiling all night. It was a big hit. He is also a rough and tumble kind of kid so it's really durable and he hasn't knocked it down yet.
customer_reviews.author: Laniesa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hideout
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1-year old granddaughter's favorite crash pad/hideout. It is sturdy, spacious, and well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: PRSoldier

customer_reviews.title: So impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the cutest and most well made little Teepee on the market! My daughter is in love with it and so am I. At nap time she wants to sleep in with the little star lights on and the window covers down. But at night she love watching her favorite shows or reading a book. I was so surprised at the quality of this teepee. The fabric is stick and strong and it was so easy to assemble too. Now I just have to get one for my youngest daughter too. So we can have outdoor movie night.
customer_reviews.author: joao martins

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this teepee! It comes in a surprisingly small package that would be perfect for a gift. We are especially happy we spent the extra few $ for one that has a canvas floor vs an open floor style. It makes it more stable. We don't have the light or the feathers on it yet, but they are adorable also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Another pleasant surprise from Amazon. I purchased based off of positive reviews and ultimately, price. It’s a winner! It breaks down and packs into a bag (included) that’s about 10x18” which is ideal. Sometimes you just don’t want a giant teepee in your living room, ya know? I bought a 4’ round sheepskin rug and it fits perfectly and makes it so cozy! I love the little windows (2) and the lights. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Adelae

customer_reviews.title: My toddler likes it
customer_reviews.text: My toddler decided to sleep in the floor, so I got her this teepee to make her nighttime more fun. However, this is just 4 sticks held by a string with a piece of fabric. It’s not sturdy. I think someone can come up with a better structure
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter Loves this Tent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter for her third birthday and she loves it. It makes for a nice place for her to read. The tent is very durable and my daughter said it was not hard to put together. Don't hesitate to purchase this for your child/grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: Connie L Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: We are missing a plastic connector. So to see our daughter excited to put it together and then to tell her it wasn't going to happen was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: So well made, easy to assemble, absolutely gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this teepee tent. It has lots of pockets for holding books and toys and also has the sweetest star lights to hang from the top. The doors have ties that can hold the front flaps open or shut for privacy, making it a perfect spot for playing hide and seek or just to curl up inside with a book. Love love love the fact that the fabric is nontoxic and the base is waterproof. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: shaileshthapa

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, sturdy and aesthetic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect for my toddler. He loves sitting in it and reading his books and playing for hours..its cozy abd sturdy. The lights make it look aesthetic. A perfect tent for your kids room or game room. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great value and overall outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice quality. You cannot truly tell in pic how durable the material is. We have created stick on wooden animals and other nature pics selected by my granddaughter. Planning to continue decorating with tempura ( washable) paint. Great pricing. Looked at many and this was best value with high quality.
customer_reviews.author: JennyH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten several teepee, and this teepee is hands down the best one! It was incredibly easy to put together and is nice and sturdy. On top of that, the teepee came with cute accessories like star lights. I’ve recommended this teepee to my other friends.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Got this was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter from Santa she loves this I could have just got this best gift ever
customer_reviews.author: Smithee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this teepee for my two girls! The pockets inside are perfect to hold books, which my almost three year old is obsessed with. It’s so easy to put together and I love that it includes a travel case to take it with you!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea R.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet tent
customer_reviews.text: Really love this tent. My daughter loves the fairy lights it came with. It stays in place well especially when set on a carpeted surface. There was no chemical smell and the wood and canvas are nice natural materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great place for my 8 year old to read!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter absolutely loved this! My daughter set it up with pillows for a place to read. It was larger than I thought it would be. Much better quality than I thought it would be for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shenelle

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: All in all, it was a fantastic purchase. We were transitioning our oldest from our bed to her own room and her own bed. We put a twin mattress in it and she sleeps in it all night! She loves it and so do we! Definitely took two people to assemble, but once we got it all set up, it felt pretty sturdy. The material is high quality, so I feel like it will last a while!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I like it... also the start lights are pretty
customer_reviews.text: My girl and I like it very much. It was not easy to assemble,or at least to do the knock at the end of the poles... it took us more than 10 mins. The textile is nice, and it is a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: lariht

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a few issues
customer_reviews.text: Cute tent, mine had black grease marks like some of the other reviewers said. Luckily it was on the back. The lights are cute, feathers are cute but paper. I also expected the pretty pink flowers like in the pic but maybe I didn’t read the full description, they do not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: jodie

customer_reviews.title: Missing  part!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: After reaching out to the company they immediately sent me the missing parts. We were able to put up my daughters Teepee tent and she loves it! Thank you We bought this item for our daughter for Christmas, and were just getting easy to put it together. Material seems very durable unfortunately we are missing one of the white spacers to be able to put together the tent for our daughter. Want to try and reach out to the company to see if we can just get that one part shipped to us! My daughter was really disappointed we couldn’t get the tent up for her today.
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a cute tent for kids! My 6-year-old loves reading in it and loves the pockets on the inside to store a couple of books. The fairy lights are a nice addition. The "feathers" are just paper - they are fine but I would have preferred something more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Seemann

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier absolutely gorgeous. Easy to set up, if you have a little help. Could be challenging alone, but it is a wonderful unit and larger than expected! You can add extra flowers and lights around the top to really make it your own.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I looks great! Just needs to stay open a bit better. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy care.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tee pee for 1 year old birthday pictures. For this purpose it was perfect! My 4 year old loved it also, but it is not terribly sturdy, so it’s more of a quiet corner type of play tent. Comes with the star lights (battery operated) which were perfect for us. I added some flower sprigs and it looked beautiful and we will keep it as a reading nook for our kiddos. Easy and quick to put together. Nice sturdy canvas material without being too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Strouse

product_meta.title: TazzToys Kids Teepee Tent for Kids with Fairy Lights +Waterproof Base + Feathers - Quality & Safety Certified
feature_bullets: ✅ Our UNIQUELY DESIGNED teepee tent uses BEAUTIFUL KIDDO-SAFE EXPOSED PINE POLES & durable, 100% COTTON MATERIAL to stunningly stand out from the rest. The TWO VENTILATING WINDOWS with CLOSING CURTAINS & CLOSING FRONT FLAP provide hours of independent fun for your littles. NOT just 1 but 2 DOUBLE POCKETS for their favorite toys & books for a stargazing storytime!

✅ DESIGNED TO GIVE YOUR little ones a SAFE & FUN PLACE to let their imaginations run wild, our kids teepee tent was INDEPENDENTLY LAB-TESTED FOR A CHILD SAFETY CERTIFICATE 0-12 by CPSIA, with 100% NATURAL, NON-TOXIC, UNPAINTED COTTON & tent poles with NO CHEMICALS OR SPLINTERS and utilize STURDY PINE & HIGH QUALITY CONNECTORS prevent slipping.

✅ Our tent CAN BE BROKEN DOWN & EASILY TRANSPORTED in our COMPACT CARRY BAG, which can be worn like a string backpack to keep you HANDS-FREE ON THE GO for wrangling your adventurous little ones! And you’ll love our WATERPROOF TENT BASE THAT PROTECTS CARPETS from accidents & spills & helps to keep it dry on the grass or at the beach. With its fun and endlessly CUSTOMIZABLE DESIGN, our teepee tents for kids will earn a special place in your child’s heart.

✅ With our kids teepee, your little ones can GO WHEREVER THEIR IMAGINATION TAKES THEM – ON A SAFARI, CAMPING IN THE WOODS, or on an ADVENTURE IN THEIR VERY OWN PRINCESS TENT, all from the safety of your home or yard! Makes the perfect blank canvas for creative kids to customize it with PAINT, STICKERS & OTHER CRAFTS! Great for keeping kids entertained for hours at BIRTHDAYS, WEDDINGS & EVENTS.

✅ TAZZ TOYS ARE MADE FOR KIDS BY KIDS AT HEART. We design each kids playhouse with CAREFUL ATTENTION TO DETAIL to ensure you get a tent outdoor & indoor that you can TRUST FOR YEARS TO COME. If you have any questions regarding your kid teepee, please get in touch with us and WE’LL BE HAPPY TO ASSIST YOU. We hope you & your kids, grandkids, nieces & nephews love our teepee tents & teepee decorations as much as we do.
